titleStmt.title: A Noble dewel, or, An Unmatchable combate betwixt Sir VVilliam [Gray] and the Earl of Southast [sic] being a true relation how this b[?] E. of Southast murthered Sir William Gray, son to the right ho[nourable] the Lord Gray ... tune of, Sir George VVharton

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.)
Imperfect: torn, stained, and defaced, with loss of text; printed as single sheet, now in two parts.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
